short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns Trump into The Snail King, plus some surprises

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces the word Trump with "The Snail King," plus replaces other related words to delight and/or annoy you.

If reading the news is a drag, the Snail King extension might make it more fun.
